title: Watch: Large Fight Breaks Out Over New LeBron James Shoes
title_page: Watch: Large Fight Breaks Out Over New LeBron James Shoes | Breitbart
text:
Per a New York Post report, a fight broke out Friday in New York City among people waiting to get a pair of Cleveland Cavaliers star LeBron James’ new LeBron 14 sneakers.
Video surfaced of the brawl, showing people punching and shoving each other outside of a Foot Locker.
The NYPD reportedly did not have information on the incident and could not say if anyone was arrested as part of the fighting.
Although the LeBron 14 sneakers are set to be released February 10, Foot Locker sold a limited amount of the $175 basketball shoes Friday.
Follow Trent Baker on Twitter @MagnifiTrent
